Randomly permute some or all columns of a data frame

muddle.Rd

Shuffle any of the columns of a data.frame to artificially distort relationships.

muddle(
    data,
    at,
    ...
)

Arguments

data

A data.frame.
at

A vector of quoted/unquoted columns, positions, and/or tidyselect::select_helpers. Defaults to all columns.
...

Additional arguments passed to sample.

Value

A tibble::tibble

Author

Alex Zajichek

Examples

#Set a seed
set.seed(123)

#Default permutes all columns
heart_disease %>%
  muddle

#> # A tibble: 303 x 9
#>      Age Sex   ChestPain    BP Cholesterol BloodSugar MaximumHR ExerciseInduced…
#>    <dbl> <fct> <fct>     <dbl>       <dbl> <lgl>          <dbl> <fct>           
#>  1    43 Fema… Non-angi…   130         214 FALSE            120 Yes             
#>  2    44 Male  Asymptom…   130         204 FALSE            143 Yes             
#>  3    68 Fema… Asymptom…   128         242 FALSE            125 Yes             
#>  4    35 Fema… Asymptom…   120         269 FALSE            163 Yes             
#>  5    45 Fema… Atypical…   138         240 FALSE            169 No              
#>  6    54 Male  Asymptom…   128         209 FALSE            182 Yes             
#>  7    61 Male  Asymptom…   100         258 FALSE            152 Yes             
#>  8    57 Fema… Asymptom…   152         229 FALSE            142 No              
#>  9    67 Male  Non-angi…   110         283 FALSE            138 No              
#> 10    51 Fema… Atypical…   125         204 TRUE             161 No              
#> # … with 293 more rows, and 1 more variable: HeartDisease <fct>

#Permute select columns
heart_disease %>%
  muddle(
    at = c(Age, Sex)
  )

#> # A tibble: 303 x 9
#>      Age Sex   ChestPain    BP Cholesterol BloodSugar MaximumHR ExerciseInduced…
#>    <dbl> <fct> <fct>     <dbl>       <dbl> <lgl>          <dbl> <fct>           
#>  1    47 Male  Typical …   145         233 TRUE             150 No              
#>  2    49 Fema… Asymptom…   160         286 FALSE            108 Yes             
#>  3    59 Male  Asymptom…   120         229 FALSE            129 Yes             
#>  4    35 Male  Non-angi…   130         250 FALSE            187 No              
#>  5    44 Fema… Atypical…   130         204 FALSE            172 No              
#>  6    29 Fema… Atypical…   120         236 FALSE            178 No              
#>  7    45 Male  Asymptom…   140         268 FALSE            160 No              
#>  8    59 Male  Asymptom…   120         354 FALSE            163 Yes             
#>  9    46 Male  Asymptom…   130         254 FALSE            147 No              
#> 10    54 Male  Asymptom…   140         203 TRUE             155 Yes             
#> # … with 293 more rows, and 1 more variable: HeartDisease <fct>

#Using a select helper
heart_disease %>%
  muddle(
    at = matches("^S")
  )

#> # A tibble: 303 x 9
#>      Age Sex   ChestPain    BP Cholesterol BloodSugar MaximumHR ExerciseInduced…
#>    <dbl> <fct> <fct>     <dbl>       <dbl> <lgl>          <dbl> <fct>           
#>  1    63 Male  Typical …   145         233 TRUE             150 No              
#>  2    67 Male  Asymptom…   160         286 FALSE            108 Yes             
#>  3    67 Male  Asymptom…   120         229 FALSE            129 Yes             
#>  4    37 Male  Non-angi…   130         250 FALSE            187 No              
#>  5    41 Fema… Atypical…   130         204 FALSE            172 No              
#>  6    56 Fema… Atypical…   120         236 FALSE            178 No              
#>  7    62 Male  Asymptom…   140         268 FALSE            160 No              
#>  8    57 Male  Asymptom…   120         354 FALSE            163 Yes             
#>  9    63 Male  Asymptom…   130         254 FALSE            147 No              
#> 10    53 Male  Asymptom…   140         203 TRUE             155 Yes             
#> # … with 293 more rows, and 1 more variable: HeartDisease <fct>

#Pass other arguments
heart_disease %>%
  muddle(
    size = 5,
    replace = TRUE
  )

#> # A tibble: 5 x 9
#>     Age Sex   ChestPain     BP Cholesterol BloodSugar MaximumHR ExerciseInduced…
#>   <dbl> <fct> <fct>      <dbl>       <dbl> <lgl>          <dbl> <fct>           
#> 1    41 Male  Atypical …   135         321 FALSE            180 Yes             
#> 2    42 Male  Atypical …   128         212 TRUE             172 Yes             
#> 3    63 Male  Typical a…   152         234 FALSE            115 No              
#> 4    37 Male  Non-angin…   130         289 FALSE             71 No              
#> 5    41 Male  Atypical …   150         160 FALSE            192 No              
#> # … with 1 more variable: HeartDisease <fct>
